venue.address_2: corner of Center St. & Main St. (Rt.10)
venue.name: Downtown SOUTHINGTON Green

item.description:
TONIGHT (THU 8/26): FREE “EAGLES” music - SOUTHINGTON GREEN

Gather @ 6:00 to sit together – Show starts @ 7:00 PM


"E-2: An EAGLES Experience"


This eight piece multi-talented group of music professionals
pay tribute to The Eagles as no others can.


GPS or MapQuest to: 75 Main Street, Southington, CT 06489

Downtown Southington, corner of Center St. & Main St. (Rt.10)


To more easily find each other, facing the stage, we’ll be
sitting to the LEFT directly “on the closed road” in front of
the American Legion hall.


Look for Rob Pudney (5’10”, brown hair, glasses, now w/ short
grey/white beard) in a low beach chair, wearing a sleeveless
yellow t-shirt w/ black “Bus 13” on front and back, shorts, &
sandals. C: 860-690-9595. (If lost, stand on the steps of the
American Legion Hall when you are calling me and I’ll wave you
over).


This concert was postponed from last evening.


Local vendors available, or bring a Subway, snacks, etc., for a
picnic while listening to great music. Please be “discreet”
re: no open alcohol.


This posting is being sent via “The Singles Event” and Al R.’s

http://www.meetup.com....

And submitted to several other MeetUp groups for posting as
they see fit.


It’ll be a BEAUTIFUL evening to listen to fun music with old
friends and meet new friends! Please join us for this “
spontaneous” event! All welcome!


***


FYI – On a different note, please also check out:

http://www.meetup.com....

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Short Notice but Something Fun To Do...PLEASE READ
